internal.content:
---
title: IBM Fusion AI
description: IBM Fusion AI
tabs: [Overview, Tutorials, Resources]
---

import { principlesSection } from '../../styles/Grid.module.scss';
import {Insights } from '@carbon/pictograms-react';

<PageDescription>

Articles, blogs, and videos sharing insights, best practices, and real‑world experiences with IBM Fusion for AI.

</PageDescription>
{/* 
<AnchorLinks>
  <AnchorLink>Build</AnchorLink>
  <AnchorLink>Run</AnchorLink>
  <AnchorLink>Bring Your Data</AnchorLink>
</AnchorLinks>
 */}

<Row className={principlesSection}>
</Row>

<Row className="resource-card-group-3-across">
  <Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title="How to deploy an AI Chat Server on IBM Fusion HCI with IBM Bob in 20 minutes"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      actionIcon="launch"
      href="https://medium.com/@andretost_75145/how-to-deploy-an-ai-chat-server-on-an-ibm-fusion-hci-with-ibm-bob-in-20-minutes-without-typing-187d01700569"
    />
  </Column>
  <Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title="Building Enterprise LLMOps on IBM Fusion HCI with OpenShift AI"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      actionIcon="launch"
      href="https://medium.com/@purnanandkumar7/building-enterprise-llmops-on-ibm-fusion-hci-with-openshift-ai-5fb76c3c3cda"
    />
  </Column>
  <Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title="From REST APIs to Conversational AI: How MCP Makes IBM CAS Talk to Your AI Agents"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      actionIcon="launch"
      href="https://medium.com/@singrohanamita/from-rest-apis-to-conversational-ai-how-mcp-makes-ibm-cas-talk-to-your-ai-agents-5478cd584ca5"
    />
  </Column>
</Row>

<Row className="resource-card-group-3-across">

 <Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
   <ResourceCard
     subTitle="Blog"
     title="Deploying NVIDIA AI-Q on IBM Fusion HCI"
     aspectRatio="2:1"
     actionIcon="launch"
     href="https://medium.com/@anushkajaiswal2208/deploying-nvidia-ai-q-on-ibm-fusion-hci-bd5ce7b7056e"
   />
 </Column>
 <Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
   <ResourceCard
     subTitle="Blog"
     title="Deploying NVIDIA RAG Blueprint on IBM Fusion HCI"
     aspectRatio="2:1"
     actionIcon="launch"
     href="https://medium.com/@singrohanamita/deploying-nvidia-rag-blueprint-on-ibm-fusion-hci-9d14503dd239"
   />
 </Column>

</Row>
